components.data: 10×One Step RNA PCR Buffer 2.5μl, MgCl2 (25mM) 5μl, dNTP Mixture (10mM) 2.5μl, RNaseInhibitor (40U/μl) 0.5μl, AMVRTaseXL (5U/μl) 0.5μl, AMV-Optimized Taq (5U/μl) 0.5μl, RT-21 (20μM )0.5μl, MAW-26 (20μM) 0.5μl, RNA template according to the load value add 1 to 10μl, added RNase Free dH2O to 25μl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: 10×One Step RNA PCR Buffer 2.5μl, MgCl2 (25mM) 5μl, dNTP Mixture (10mM) 2.5μl, RNaseInhibitor (40U/μl) 0.5μl, AMVRTaseXL (5U/μl) 0.5μl, AMV-Optimized Taq (5U/μl) 0.5μl, RT-21 (20μM )0.5μl, MAW-26 (20μM) 0.5μl, RNA template according to the load value add 1 to 10μl, added RNase Free dH2O to 25μl.

components.data: The first round reaction system of reverse transcription and nested amplification
components.name: Section

source_data.section: The first round reaction system of reverse transcription and nested amplification

components.data: Prereact PCR reaction tube added the RNA template 94℃ 2 min, and 50℃ 5min, the configuration of the reaction solution quickly joined in the process, and then reverse transcription 30min 50℃, then 94℃ 2 min to inactivated reverse transcriptase. Then 94℃ 30s, 55℃ 30s, 72℃ 150s ,30 cycles, and extend 10 min at 72℃ to complete the first round reaction.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prereact PCR reaction tube added the RNA template 94℃ 2 min, and 50℃ 5min, the configuration of the reaction solution quickly joined in the process, and then reverse transcription 30min 50℃, then 94℃ 2 min to inactivated reverse transcriptase. Then 94℃ 30s, 55℃ 30s, 72℃ 150s ,30 cycles, and extend 10 min at 72℃ to complete the first round reaction.

components.data: Amplification conditions of the first round
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Amplification conditions of the first round

components.data: In the first round of PCR products as template for the nested second round amplification reaction system are as follows: 10xPCR Buffer 2.5μL, dNTP Mixture (10mM) 0.5μl, PRO-1 (20μM) 0.5μl, RT-20 (20μM) 0.5μl, Taq enzyme (5U/μl) 0.25μl, the template 3μl, add RNase Free dH2O to 25μl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In the first round of PCR products as template for the nested second round amplification reaction system are as follows: 10xPCR Buffer 2.5μL, dNTP Mixture (10mM) 0.5μl, PRO-1 (20μM) 0.5μl, RT-20 (20μM) 0.5μl, Taq enzyme (5U/μl) 0.25μl, the template 3μl, add RNase Free dH2O to 25μl.

components.data: The nested second round amplification reaction system
components.name: Section

source_data.section: The nested second round amplification reaction system

components.data: The reaction procedure is 94℃, pre denatured 5min, 94℃30s, 63℃30s, 72℃ 150s, 30 cycles, and 72℃10min. Two rounds of amplification are expected to have a target size of about 1300bp.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The reaction procedure is 94℃, pre denatured 5min, 94℃30s, 63℃30s, 72℃ 150s, 30 cycles, and 72℃10min. Two rounds of amplification are expected to have a target size of about 1300bp.
